title: Bright Family Duplex with Garden in Tech-Friendly Stare Miasto
description: Step into this spacious four-bedroom, three-bathroom duplex, designed for contemporary living and optimum comfort. With an airy open floor plan, layered light from floor-to-ceiling windows, and stylish interiors, the home offers generous communal areas as well as private retreats for work and relaxation. The luxurious guest bathroom, landscaped surroundings, and a dedicated barbecue zone make it an entertainer’s delight. Every detail is thought through – from high-speed internet connections for remote work to generous storage and relaxing terraces.
neighborhood_description: Live at the heart of Poznan in Stare Miasto—a vibrant district weaving together centuries-old street life with the city’s fast-moving tech culture. Abundant public transport and extensive bike lines put cafés, bakeries, co-working hubs, and retail playgrounds at your fingertips. The area exudes a pet-friendly, community-driven spirit and boasts parks perfect for morning runs or afternoon walks.
key_features: three contemporary bathrooms, including guest bath
lifestyle_benefits: designed for digital nomads or those working remotely
close to tech hubs and coworking spaces
walkable access to parks and historic sights
target_buyer: Ideal for digital nomads, tech professionals, creative families, or anyone looking for a dynamic base with flexible work from home setups and space to grow.
market_positioning: Well-positioned above standard market offerings for centrally located duplexes—unique blend of historical urban energy and family-home comfort, modernized for today’s work/life balance trends.
